ctx: destruct (in_dec Nat.eq_dec a l) as [Hin | Hnin].
exceptions.exn: In environment a : nat l : list nat Hnin : In a l -> False Unable to unify "0" with "evalStrongRec 1 (fun n Hrecs p1 : nat => switchPR n (switchPR (if cPairPi1 (Init.Nat.pred n) =? p1 then 1 else 0) 1 (codeNth (n - S (cPairPi2 (Init.Nat.pred n))) Hrecs)) 0) (codeList l) a".

original: intros a l. unfold codeIn. destruct (in_dec Nat.eq_dec a l) as [Hin | Hnin]. - rewrite Hin. reflexivity. - rewrite Hnin. reflexivity.
